web.name: PHP
web.description: The main language I use within my job! I have gone from knowing nothing about PHP, to understanding it more than MATLAB; my strongest programming language for the past few years.

web.name: React
web.description: The language the website has been built in! I've taken multiple online courses in React and am learning more all of the time! Check out the Movies section of this website to see how my learning of React is going!

web.name: SQL
web.description: Another language used often within my job. I have become proficient in using SQL when querying databases, as well as using it in various PHP query Builders (such as Eloquent and CodeIgniter's Query Builder).

web.name: JavaScript
web.description: A language that I both love and hate compared to PHP! I used javascript in React, with jQuery and as vanilla, and am constantly increasing my understanding of it.

other.name: MATLAB
other.description: The language used for my Dissertation! MATLAB was my go-to programming language of choice during my years studying Mathematics at university, so is one of my strongest programming languages.

other.name: C++
other.description: A language I studied during university, C++ introduced me to object based programming.

other.name: C#
other.description: I self-taught C# by redoing university assignments in this language, but have not looked at it very much recently!

other.name: Python
other.description: A language I've recently started to try out. Whenever I have come across Python, I more-or-less follow along, and it is a programming language that I have in my sights on for future use!

additional.name: Git
additional.description: Used briefly during my dissertation, I now use Git (mainly with GitHub) on a daily basis during my role as a Software Developer.

additional.name: jQuery
additional.description: Arguable the syntax I had the most trouble understanding initially, I now am confident in using jQuery as much as regular javascript.

additional.name: CodeIgniter
additional.description: One of the main Frameworks used in my job, I have developed an understanding of CodeIgniter and will continue to learn it in more detail as I work closely with it.

additional.name: Laravel
additional.description: A Framework that I've become confident in more recent months due to using it increasingly, Laravel has become my preferred Framework when working with PHP

additional.name: React Native
additional.description: Building on my React knowledge whilst developing apps is an exciting concept, so I have undertaken two courses to learn React Native in more detail!

additional.name: LaTeX
additional.description: Used to write both my project and final-year dissertation at university, I became very fluent in using LaTeX. My preferred way to access it was the online editor Overleaf.

additional.name: Hardware
additional.description: Having built my first computer over 7 years ago, I have always had an interest in computer hardware. I've now built over 10 computers and regularly update their components to keep them up to date!

additional.name: Ubuntu Server
additional.description: I've used various Linux distributions over the past few years, but have gained knowledge in setting up Ubuntu servers and SSH relatively recently.

additional.name: TypeScript
additional.description: Something I have recently started to learn to build upon my JavaScript knowledge.
